name: WeatherBot Pro
description: Comprehensive weather information and forecasting agent providing real-time data for any global location
author: Weather Services Inc

skills.name: Current Weather
skills.description: Get real-time weather conditions for any location worldwide

skills.name: Weather Forecast
skills.description: Get detailed weather forecasts up to 14 days for any location

skills.name: Weather Alerts
skills.description: Receive severe weather alerts and warnings for specified locations

skills.name: Historical Weather Data
skills.description: Access historical weather data for analysis and comparison

pricing.details: Free tier: 100 requests/day. Pro tier: Unlimited requests starting at $29/month
